Interface uci.gef.event.GraphSelectionListener

  Summary 

public interface  GraphSelectionListener
     extends java.util.EventListener
{
          // Methods 1
     public abstract void selectionChanged(GraphSelectionEvent);
}

An interface that must be implemented by any object that wants to be notified when an Editor changes its selection(s).

See Also: Editor, uci.gef.SelectionManger
